comment._content: Congratulations this image is just what Classic Sailing's – Tall Ships and Traditional Vessels Group is looking for. I would be really delighted if you could add this photo to the group. FlickR discussion - Tall Ship Spotting - FlickR discussion – Ask the Skipper
